<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Directed Channel](/Feats.aspx?ID=278) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=26" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 123 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You can shape the energy you channel in a single direction, reaching farther and in a more directed fashion. When you cast a version of [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) or [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) that has an area, you can make its area a 60-foot cone instead of a 30-foot emanation.
name: Directed Channel
